001package com.technototes.library.hardware;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.HardwareDevice;
004
005public class DummyDevice<T> implements HardwareDevice {
006
007    private final T internal;
008
009    public DummyDevice(T inter) {
010        internal = inter;
011    }
012
013    @Override
014    public Manufacturer getManufacturer() {
015        return Manufacturer.Unknown;
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public String getDeviceName() {
020        return internal.toString();
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public String getConnectionInfo() {
025        return "dummy device";
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public int getVersion() {
030        return 0;
031    }
032
033    @Override
034    public void resetDeviceConfigurationForOpMode() {}
035
036    @Override
037    public void close() {}
038
039    public T get() {
040        return internal;
041    }
042}
